Activity - Determine the Successor and the Feasible Successor Network Topology

Use the network topology as a reference for determining the EIGRP successor and feasible successor in each of the scenarios. Click Button 2 to get started.

Activity - Scenario 1: Determine the Feasible Successor

Determine the successor and feasible successor routes for R2 by dragging the successor and feasible successor labels to the appropriate fields in the topology. Click Button 1 to review. Click Button 3 to continue this activity.
You have successfully identified the successor and the feasible successor routes for R2. Click Button 3 to continue.
You have not successfully identified the successor and the feasible successor routes for R2. Please click Reset to try again.

Activity - Scenario 2: Determine the Successor and the Feasible Successor

Determine the successor and feasible successor routes for R1 by dragging the successor and feasible successor labels to the appropriate fields in the topology. Click Button 1 to review the topology.
You have successfully identified the successor and the feasible successor routes for R1.
You have not successfully identified the successor and the feasible successor routes for R1. Please click Reset to try again.
